title.narrative: Emergency assistance to refugees, displaced persons and vulnerable host population in the Diffa region.

description.narrative: WFP, using CERF funds will be able to meet the immediate food needs of 30,000 beneficiaries (new influx into Niger from Nigeria and host populations) for a period of 3 months. This assistance will be provided only during the lean season when food insecurity and malnutrition rates are at their highest. WFP’s assistance will be provided through unconditional food assistance (general food distribution) to both the displaced people from Nigeria and the most vulnerable families hosting them. WFP’s food security response is linked to the nutritional interventions by linking general food distribution with nutrition activities to children under 2 years of age and pregnant and lactating women.
